Class MapSimulatorView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • com.IDG.mapSimulator.MapSimulatorView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class MapSimulatorView
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class is the view for the Game Simulation GUI
    Since:
    Build 1
    Version:
    Build 1
    Author:
    Pavan Sokke Nagaraj
